subject: Personal Finance
title: Market Sentiment Indicators
description: A quick win: understand Market Sentiment Indicators.

hook.text: The 'Fear and Greed Index' measures one thing: are investors terrified or euphoric right now?

buildup.text: Sentiment indicators track investor mood through surveys, trading volumes, and options activity.

discovery.text: Extreme fear often signals a buying opportunity. Extreme greed often signals a top.

twist.text: Sentiment is a contrarian indicator. The crowd's mood tells you what NOT to do.

climax.text: Professional traders watch sentiment data closely. It doesn't predict timing, but it reveals extremes.

punchline.text: The crowd's mood is a contrarian signal.

quiz.question: How do contrarian investors use sentiment indicators?
options: They do the opposite of extreme crowd sentiment
